item.description:
TMIRCE is getting spooky!

Wear your favorite Halloween costume to the run this week.

Win a prize for best costume. (To be voted on facebook)

Breakfast Details : Potluck style. That means bring some food and share a breakfast item (eggs, bagels, fruits, muffins, juice, bacon, potatoes, llamas etc.)

You are not obligated to bring anything, though, so please join us for breakfast after the run!

ALL ABILITY LEVELS ARE WELCOME!!!

Meter parking is easily accessible on Comm Ave. and also Gardner St. which runs parallel behind the store. The B train on the Green Line stops directly across from the store at Babcock St.

* "The Rock" has moved to CITY SPORTS located at the intersection of Commonwealth Ave. and Babcock St.

View City Sports in a larger map
